Commentary: a flat start, quick outside off, defended into the off side, towards cover

Commentary: full outside off, 92 kph, the ball drifts, doesn't spin, driven to cover

Commentary: slower through the air outside off, 91 kph, off the outside half towards third man

Commentary: flat and quick, wider outside off, hit away to cover from the crease. First run of the evening.

Commentary: drifts down leg, wide. Absolutely no turn so far this over

Commentary: short around off, sits up, 89 kph, defended back

Commentary: driven away to cover. Full and wide, the slider, a quick single and Kusal makes the run eventually. A tight single.
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: quick and straight, nudged away into the leg side, towards midwicket for one. Hurrying the batsman with his skiddy nature.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: a length delivery outside off, carved away towards backward point. The ball beats the fielder, much to the joy of the crowd. By the time, third man got to the ball, both batsmen were set on two.

Commentary: good single, full around off, just tapped towards point and Gunathilaka calls for one. Excellently played.

Commentary: a full delivery, sees Kusal backing away and follows him. Pushed towards cover
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to BKG Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: nice timing on that. Races away to the midwicket boundary. Good length delivery down leg, flicked away with immense power into that gap. Mahmudullah labours after it from mid-on and can't haul the ball back in.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to BKG Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: taken! Shakib strikes in his comeback. It's flat and straight, Gunathilaka backs away, looking to hit the ball straight. But his timing is off, and all he can do is chip the ball to the fielder at long-on, who runs to his right and takes a smart catch.
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunathilaka, OUT

Commentary: shortish and slow, punched down to long-on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to BKG Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: short, wide and put away. Flat, too much width. Carved away through cover for four. Amazing timing again.

Commentary: too straight, nudged down to long-on for one. Nicely played.

Commentary: shortish, wide, skidding back in, carved to backward point

Commentary: the dart, quick down leg, a leading edge towards midwicket

Commentary: short and quick, outside off. Kusal Mendis looks to drive uppishly but fails to make contact

Commentary: a good length delivery outside off, carved away towards backward point. Fine timing, but the placement isn't great

Commentary: short again, outside off, tapped towards backward point. 138 kph.

Commentary: the cutter, full outside off, and wide. The ball beats the bat.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: taken at midwicket! A short delivery from Mustafizur, short and hurrying Kusal Mendis on the pull. He can't quite time his pull, picks out the fielder. A fantastic over from Mustafizur, culminates with a wicket.

Dismissal_text: BKG Mendis c Soumya Sarkar b Mustafizur Rahman 11 (14b 2x4 0x6) SR: 78.57

Commentary: short and quick, around off, slashed away towards point.

Commentary: beaten on the outside edge. Slow outside off, the ball takes some turn and beats Tharanga.

Commentary: slow around off, flat trajectory. Defended back. Losing some momentum here.

Commentary: slashed for four. Can't bowl there, short, wide and asking to be hit. Carved through backward point for four.

Commentary: ooh, strays down leg, wide.

Commentary: drifts down leg again, on the pads, worked away towards short fine leg. Nicely stopped from the fielder.

Commentary: run-out! Good awareness from the bowler and the midwicket fielder. Sri Lanka are now tottering. A back of a length delivery, nudged away towards midwicket with soft hands. Kusal comes down a few steps, Tharanga is indecisive and in the end, that's what costs him. He eventually runs and sacrifices himself. The fielder ran towards the stumps, then lobbed the ball to the bowler who took off the bails.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, OUT
Dismissal_text: WU Tharanga run out (Mehidy Hasan Miraz/Mustafizur Rahman) 5 (5b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00

Commentary: on middle and leg, worked to deep backward square leg.

Commentary: edged and gone! Sri Lanka are now four down for 32 in a semi-final. Stunning delivery, it's the same offcutter that has made him the bowler he is today. Pitches outside off, lulls the batsman into a stroke and then rips away. Shanaka prods, gets a thick outside edge and it's caught behind. Big trouble for Sri Lanka.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Shanaka, OUT
Dismissal_text: MD Shanaka c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mustafizur Rahman 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: caught on the deep midwicket boundary. Full, quick and accurate down leg. Kusal struggles to time his flick, the ball takes the leading edge and travels all the way to Mehidy. Sensational counter-attacking innings from Kusal, bided his time early and then launched.

Commentary: stumped! Beautiful bowling, you could sense panic from Kusal Perera keeps his composure. Slow outside off, the ball finds a big gap between bat and pad, and goes through to Kusal. The ball snakes around in his lap, then his arm. Eventually, it sticks in his left arm. And he whips off the bails with his right hand. Don't think the umpires are checking. Nothing wrong with the bowling though, lulled him forward with that loop and found a big gap between bat and pad.

Commentary: sliced away again. Full and wide, angling the ball away. All Mahmudullah can do is carve the ball away
Commentary_short: Udana to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: Shakib picks out fine leg. No one can believe that, Shakib is in disbelief, Udana is relieved. Full down leg, all Shakib can do is flick the ball straight to fine leg. Out comes the snake dance celebration from Dananjaya, this rivalry is heating up.

Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: sees the batsman coming and executes the yorker outside off, goes under the bat. Superb delivery. Excellent execution
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: a low full toss on middle, skewed away towards deep square leg. Udana runs in and can't prevent two again.
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: 137 kph, awesome batting. Keeps his composure, picks his shot and execution is good. A full delivery outside off, Mahmudullah just lap sweeps the ball over short fine leg. Helped by the pace
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: has he saved a run? Full and wide, that's a poor option with third man up. Mendis dives to his left, running around from deep cover. He does very well to save one. Three though.
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mahmudullah, 3 runs

Commentary: full and wide outside off, hit away towards mid-off. The fielder runs in, picks up and throws the stumps down at the bowler's end. More wild cheers. That means Mahmudullah won't have strike for the last over.
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz run out (Shanaka) 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: excellent bowling, a short delivery on middle and leg. Mustafizur misses a pull, and the ball goes through to the keeper. But Sri Lanka want the review. No bat, excellent use of the short ball, not such an excellent use of the review.
Commentary_short: Udana to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

Commentary: another short ball, another bouncer, Mustafizur misses and Mahmudullah runs and he makes his crease. Has Mustafizur made his? No he hasn't. Run out at the bowler's end. Was that also above his shoulder?
Commentary_short: Udana to Mustafizur Rahman, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mustafizur Rahman run out (†MDKJ Perera/Udana) 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: into the gap at cover for four. Superb batting from Mahmudullah. Full and wide outside off, drilled over cover. Would have been wide had Mahmudullah left that, but he reaches out and finds the boundary
Commentary_short: Udana to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: a low full toss, flicked to deep midwicket. The throw is not great and the batsman makes the second. Kusal had to collect wide and he missed the stumps at the batsman's end, would he have made it? Yes. That was a bad throw.
Commentary_short: Udana to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: that's flicked for six! What a finish from Mahmudullah. That's right in the slot and Bangladesh make the final. Full on middle and leg, flicked away over backward square leg for six. Colombo is stunned, the whole Bangladesh team are out there doing the snake dance.
Commentary_short: Udana to Mahmudullah, SIX runs
